Key: Hm. Just a little more...
Huh? That girl...

I-I can't reach... No, I can't give up! If reaching
doesn't work, then on my tippy-toes...!
Hey, don't do it!

(Is she taking off the poster? With that height,
there's no way she'll reach!)
(Wait. Just as I thought, her balance—!)
Watch out!
Whagyah!
Ow... Ouch. Guess that's to be expected.
...Huh? Wha? It didn't hurt...
I get it, so it'd be great if you got off of me.
Hyeeeek! I-I'm sorry!

(In the nick of time, I prevented her from
getting hurt... by getting crushed.)

Good grief. You're reckless. With that stool,
there's no way you could've reached.
I was asked to take it down, so...
Ah! No good! I'm getting called!

(Perhaps her phone was in silent mode.
It was lighting up even without vibrating.)

Thank you for helping me from getting
seriously injured!
Next time, go ahead and ask for help, okay?
Yes, I'll be careful!

(I'm sure she's a good kid who tries her
hardest. But it'll help no one if she's hurt.)
...Hm? Ah, hey! You dropped your wallet!
H-Hawaaaah!
